A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: \"This is not going to go the way you think!\"\nTruer words have never been spoken. The Last Jedi takes the risk and takes the Star Wars story in a new\, bold\, and risky direction. It wasn't perfect\, but damn was it fun. The Porgs were great\, seeing our princess Carrie Fisher one last time was awesome\, and big props to Mark Hamill for this new approach to Luke and the Jedi way. Some neat surprises & twists\, and amazing special effects.
